blogs.title: welcome
blogs.body: Welcome to my new website! My name is Colton Leach, and this has been a crazy cool project specifically for learning React.

blogs.title: start of a new project
blogs.body: This is gonna be a piece of cake.

blogs.title: i need a stamina elixir
blogs.body: Alright, this is a bit tougher than anticipated

blogs.title: im in too deep
blogs.body: What have I got myself into?

blogs.title: everything is fine
blogs.body: This project might actually be a perfect idea.

blogs.title: state management is tough
blogs.body: Learning to properly manage the state between sibling components is making this project a roller coaster.

blogs.title: taking a break from this project
blogs.body: Im going to take a break to focus on class, will come back and complete it. Its basically 90% finish, and its looking so good.

blogs.title: and im back
blogs.body: Oh man, I dont even recognize this project anymore. This might take a while to get back in the groove of things.

blogs.title: a new approach
blogs.body: I have finally accepted that the original approach I took was a bit too advanced for me, so Im now going to do the appropriate thing and finish it the way I know can be done, then come back and complete it the original way I want to.

blogs.title: a new approach
blogs.body: I finally fixed my problem I was having when selecting a channel, as well as the message styling. It's all uphill from here! I should be able to finish this project soon ðŸ¥³
